mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knn.trained_vector ( file_name, keyword, label, tf, idf, tf_idf, df, seq ) VALUES (#{file_name}, #{keyword}, #{label}, #{tf}, #{idf}, #{tf_idf}, #{df}, #{seq})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(max(id),0)+1 as id FROM knn.client_vector
